title: Identify the Need for More Data
text: Consider if there is new information that needs to be added to the spreadsheet.

title: Check Existing Rows
text: Look at the current rows to see if they can accommodate the new data.

title: Evaluate Data Fit
text: Determine if the new data fits within the existing structure of the spreadsheet.

title: Consider Data Organization
text: Think about how the new data will be organized in relation to the existing data.

hintAnswer: When you need to include additional data that doesn't fit in the existing rows.
title: Decide on Adding a Row
text: You should add a new row to your spreadsheet $$___$$
choices: When you need to include additional data that doesn't fit in the existing rows.
When you want to change the color of the spreadsheet.
When you want to delete data from the spreadsheet.
When you want to print the spreadsheet.
